message.content:
cs.IT, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SI, cs.DS 

The paper deals with the problem of estimating the strength of a causal relationship between variables, which is a topic that falls under the purview of information theory (cs.IT). The paper also proposes a novel estimator for calculating Shannon capacity, which is a measure of dependence between conditional distributions, and discusses its consistency, which are topics that are relevant to machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also demonstrates an application of the proposed estimator to single-cell flow-cytometry, which is a topic that falls under the sub-category of computational biology (cs.SI). Finally, the paper deals with the problem of calculating Shannon capacity from observed samples, which is a topic that is relevant to data science (cs.DS).
